name: King of Monsters - Bullet Hell
description:
Description.

You are King Ghidorah, a Kaiju making destruction in Japan, until you found out Godzilla another kaiju that is planning to save the humankind against you.

-In gameplay we have different enemies that will try to end our lifes, also a big boss, that is godzilla with attack patterns

-This is a gameplay inspired in touhou project.

-Currently in early access and in development, so any feedback and support will help this project to be done soon.

-This version has only one level, the idea is to bring more kaijus into the table to fight with.

Any of your feedback will support this project to get a final state, and be done with a lot of new levels and types of enemies.

Thanks for your support. 

Axolotes Co.
